entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 28 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:33 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:33 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
